text: when I was thinking about my internship
I knew that I wanted to transition from
business unit strategy to corporate
strategy to get a more holistic view of
how companies think about their future
growth coming from a finance background
what I really wanted to gain this summer
was working at a tech company um in San
Francisco having had some tech investing
experience prior to HBS this summer I'll
be working with nextera energy resources
development team I'll be helping them
figure out how to best integrate battery
storage systems into their grid I
decided to join Boston Consulting Group
in their Boston office and I'm hoping to
work in their people and organization
practice at Nike this summer I'm looking
to do two things the first learn about
the retail industry in depth the second
learn how a leading brand such as Nike
is dealing with the digital challenges
that are present across the sports
ecosystem coming from a investing and um
Finance background what I'm hoping to
gain this summer is understanding what
it's like to work um in an operating
role um on a small team at a fast moving
company I wanted to use this summer to
dive into the renewable energy space and
also to transition from the world of
Consulting to working for a company
doing renewable energy projects
